rathu ho sudu nadu kilowak rupiyal 92katath, rathu ho sudu kakulu sahal kilowak rupiyal 89katath alewi kala yuthu bawata ema gasat niwedanaye sadahan.kese wethath, thoga saha sillara weladun penwa denne palana mila ganan yatathe thamanta sahal nolabena bawayi.me athara, rajaya prakashayata path kara athi mila ganan yatathe sahal miladi ganimata nomathi bawa paribhogika janathawa da prakasha karana athara wyaparikayin penwa denne alewi kirimata sahal nomathi bawatayi.kese wethath, paribhogika sewa adhikariya sandahan kale melesa sahal mila ihala yamata hethu wi aththe atham pudgalayin sahal sagawa kruthrima sahal higayak athi kirimata uthsaha kirima nisa bawayi.

munta oona munge shariya nithiyen palanaya wena wenama palathak hadaganna .mewata idadunnoth me ratath munge ara anith kalakanni arabi ratawal thathwayata pathwewi .mu aanduwe salli walin arabi ratawalata gihilla karanne anthawadaya pathurawanna kumanthranaya karana eka .wahabiyo thama me rate jathika samagiya nathikaranna pradhana hethuwa .kalayak thisse thibunu sinhala muslim bandima kaduwe arabiyen aapu wahabi wadaya .dan muslim prajawa inne wahabi karayange balapama yatathe wahabi karayo hewath sawudi ,kuwet ,katar ,pakisthan wage ratawal thama me rate anthawadaya pathurawanna mudal pompa karanne .madrasa pasal eewagema anthawadaya pathurawana muslim antharjathika pasal kiyala handunwana pasal walin bihiwanne tharsthawadiyo .samahara batahira ratawala wahabi thahanama.
